mapper.insert: insert into member_table (memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberEmail, memberMobile, memberLocal, memberLocal2, memberLocal3) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberMobile}, #{memberLocal}, #{memberLocal2}, #{memberLocal3})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
select memberId from member_table where memberId=#{memberId}
select * from member_table order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit} -- HashMap = 여기서 parameterType을 java.util.HashMap으로 준다
mapper.update: update member_table set memberPassword=#{memberPassword}, memberName=#{memberName}, memberEmail=#{memberEmail}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile}, memberLocal=#{memberLocal}, memberLocal2=#{memberLocal2} where id=#{id}
